privacyFeature.description: Your growth data stays yours. Track everything without compromising privacy.

community.description: Connect with fellow cultivators and tap into a network of cannabis growing wisdom.

connections.description: Link your photos to plants and assign them to grows.

growDiary.description: Capture your cultivation journey from seed to success, creating a visual story of your grow.

growStats.description: Track your green thumb triumphs with precision and celebrate each successful harvest.

FeaturesSection.description: With GrowAGram, you don't just manage your plants like a pro, but also share your successes and progress with the community. Comment, engage, and get inspired by other plant enthusiasts as you grow your green network!
FeaturesSection.title: Everything for your successful grow

HeroSection.subtitle: Cultivate, document, connect - your complete grow companion

dashboard.description: Manage your cannabis grows, track plant progress, and organize your growing journey in your personal dashboard.
dashboard.keywords: grow dashboard, cannabis grow management, plant tracking, growing journal
dashboard.title: Dashboard | Manage Your Grows | GrowAGram

explore.description: Discover and explore thousands of cannabis grows from our community. Filter by environment, growing medium, nutrients, strains and more. Learn from successful growing techniques.
explore.keywords: cannabis grows, growing gallery, marijuana cultivation, grow examples, cannabis strains, hydroponic grows, soil grows, indoor growing, outdoor growing
explore.title: Explore Grows | Cannabis Growing Gallery | GrowAGram

following.description: Stay updated with growers you follow. See their latest grows, plants, and growing progress in your personalized feed.
following.keywords: following growers, cannabis community, growing network, grower updates
following.title: Following | Your Growing Network | GrowAGram

grows.description: Complete cannabis growing journals from seed to harvest. Learn cultivation techniques, growing methods, and get inspired by successful grows.
grows.keywords: cannabis grows, growing journals, marijuana cultivation, grow diaries, cannabis growing guide, cultivation techniques
grows.title: Cannabis Grows | Complete Growing Journals | GrowAGram

plants.description: Browse cannabis plants from growers worldwide. Track growth stages, compare strains, and learn from successful cultivation techniques.
plants.keywords: cannabis plants, marijuana plants, plant tracking, cannabis strains, growing stages, plant gallery
plants.title: Cannabis Plants Gallery | Plant Tracking | GrowAGram

timeline.description: Follow the latest updates from cannabis growers worldwide. See real-time progress, growing tips, and connect with the growing community.
timeline.keywords: cannabis timeline, growing updates, marijuana community, grower feed, cannabis cultivation progress
timeline.title: Growing Timeline | Cannabis Community Feed | GrowAGram

site.description: Join the leading cannabis growing community. Share your grows, learn from experts, track your plants, and connect with growers worldwide.
site.keywords: cannabis growing, marijuana cultivation, grow journal, plant tracking, growing community, cannabis seeds, hydroponics, soil growing
site.title: GrowAGram - Cannabis Growing Community

cancel-subscription.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time through your Steady account. Your premium access will continue until the end of your current billing period.
cancel-subscription.question: Can I cancel my subscription at any time?

free-trial.answer: We currently don't offer a free trial, but you can check our free content to get a taste of what we offer before subscribing.
free-trial.question: Is there a free trial available?

how-subscription-works.answer: Our premium subscription is managed through Steady. Once you connect your Steady account, you'll have immediate access to all premium features.
how-subscription-works.question: How does the premium subscription work?

payment-methods.answer: Steady supports various payment methods including credit cards, PayPal, and SEPA direct debit. You can choose your preferred method during the subscription process.
payment-methods.question: What payment methods are accepted?

Premium.get-exclusive-access: Unlock master grower tools and join our premium cultivators circle!
